## Interview Questions

 1- What is the difference between a parameter and an argument? 2- All functions in Python by default return â€¦? 3- What are keyword arguments and when should we use them? 4- How can we make a parameter of a function optional? 5- What happens when we prefix a parameter with an asterisk (*)? 6- What about two asterisks (**)? 7- What is the scope? 8- What is the difference between local and global variables? 9- Why is using the global statement a bad practice?
